tasks.title: Repository And Package Layout Plan
deliverables: Per-language package structure and versioning strategy under apps/ paths defined in phase overview.
Shared contract artifacts location for generated types and test fixtures.
Release channel policy (alpha, beta, stable) across package managers.
acceptance_criteria: All SDK packages follow consistent naming and semantic versioning.
No language SDK is blocked by missing base contract artifacts.

tasks.title: Per-Language Feature Parity Milestones
deliverables: Milestone A: auth/session core parity for all six languages.
Milestone B: advanced options (timeouts, retries, middleware/interceptors).
Milestone C: observability hooks and structured error metadata.
acceptance_criteria: Core auth/session behavior is functionally equivalent across all languages.
Parity matrix is updated with pass/fail coverage evidence.

tasks.title: Cross-Language Conformance Tests
deliverables: Shared docker test harness that runs language-specific SDK suites against same gateway/auth environment.
Contract tests for headers, token refresh, invalid api key handling, whitelist rejection, and rate limit responses.
Snapshot outputs for standardized error payloads per scenario.
acceptance_criteria: Every language SDK passes the same canonical contract test set.

tasks.title: Runtime Support, Security Maintenance, And Transport Matrix
deliverables: Per-language runtime support matrix (minimum and target versions) with deprecation timelines.
Dependency update and vulnerability remediation cadence for each SDK package ecosystem.
Transport capability matrix covering proxy support, TLS/mTLS options, timeout behavior, and retry semantics.
Cross-platform CI matrix (Windows/Linux/macOS where applicable) for package smoke validation.
acceptance_criteria: Runtime compatibility matrix is published and validated in CI for each release channel.
Critical dependency vulnerabilities block promotion to stable release.
Transport behavior documentation is consistent across all language SDKs.
